articles.content: 14.4Dhanush Gowda to LR Chethan, 2 runs, a high full-toss, surprised that it's not called as a no-ball, Chethan swung and got a thick top-edge, the fielder at deep mid-wicket settled under it, but tr… [+39 chars]

articles.author: Danyal Rasool
articles.title: Pakistan are good, but the Netherlands evidence shows they can be better - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The emergence of Naseem Shah and Agha Salman are positives, but the middle order must give the top order more confidence
articles.content:
